meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Argentina.
meanings.sent3: Argentines in Argentina love to dance tango.
meanings.sent4: The streets of Buenos Aires were filled with argentines.
meanings.sent5: I met friendly argentines during my trip to Argentina.

meanings.sent1: The moon shone with a beautiful argentines glow.
meanings.sent2: Her dress sparkled in an argentines hue.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed white and silver to create an argentines shade.
meanings.sent4: The argentines sheen of the metal caught the light.
meanings.sent5: The clouds had a hint of argentines as the sun set.

meanings.definition: A type of fish commonly found in South American waters.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using argentines.
meanings.sent2: Argentines are known for their tasty meat.
meanings.sent3: I caught an argentine while fishing in the river.
meanings.sent4: The market sold fresh argentines from the sea.
meanings.sent5: The argentine swam gracefully in the aquarium.
